title: Introduction to Python Programming - Syllabus
content: This course provides an introduction to programming in Python. Topics include data types, control flow, functions, and an introduction to object-oriented programming. The final project will be to build a simple chatbot.

title: Introduction to Python Programming - Week 1 Lecture
content: In week 1, we will cover the basics of Python. This includes installing Python, writing your first 'Hello, World!' program, and understanding variables and basic data types like integers, floats, and strings.

title: Introduction to Python Programming - Week 2 Lecture
content: Week 2 focuses on control flow. We will learn about if-else statements for conditional logic and for/while loops for iteration. We will also cover lists and how to work with them.

title: Financial Markets - Course Overview
content: This course is an overview of financial markets. We will discuss the roles of different financial institutions, the types of securities traded, and the basics of stock and bond valuation.
